languages.text: {n}Голос Абеляра немного смягчается.{/n} "У вас нет выбора, {name}. Вы — объявленн{mf|ый|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} Вольного Торговца, и ваша судьба предопределена. Кроме того..." {n}Сенешаль понижает голос.{/n} "Если Кунрад повинен в гибели остальных кандидатов, то его убийцы должны все еще быть там... ждать. Едва ли им хватит дерзости напасть на вас, если вы будете облечены мантией Вольного Торговца. Но стоит вам сойти с корабля в статусе обычного слуги Императора..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Голос Абеляра немного смягчается.{/n} "У вас нет выбора, {name}. Вы — объявленн{mf|ый|ая} наследни{mf|к|ца} Вольного Торговца, и ваша судьба предопределена. Кроме того..." {n}Сенешаль понижает голос.{/n} "Если Кунрад повинен в гибели остальных кандидатов, то его убийцы должны все еще быть там... ждать. Едва ли им хватит дерзости напасть на вас, если вы будете облечены мантией Вольного Торговца. Но стоит вам сойти с корабля в статусе обычного слуги Императора..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德的声音缓和了些。{/n}“您别无选择，{name}。您是行商浪人的指定继承人，您的命运早已注定。不仅如此……”{n}总领压低了声音。{/n}“如果其他继承者的死，也是昆拉德一手策划的话，那他的刺客肯定还潜伏在暗处……等待机会。如果您肩负着行商浪人的威名，他们恐怕未必敢鲁莽地袭击您。可如果您仅仅是以帝皇普通仆人的身份下了船的话……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德的声音缓和了些。{/n}“您别无选择，{name}。您是行商浪人的指定继承人，您的命运早已注定。不仅如此……”{n}总领压低了声音。{/n}“如果其他继承者的死，也是昆拉德一手策划的话，那他的刺客肯定还潜伏在暗处……等待机会。如果您肩负着行商浪人的威名，他们恐怕未必敢鲁莽地袭击您。可如果您仅仅是以帝皇普通仆人的身份下了船的话……”

languages.text: {n}アベラードの声がわずかに和らぐ。{/n}「選択の余地はありません、{name}様。あなたはローグトレーダーの後継者であり、運命は決まっているのです。それに…」{n}家令長は声を低くする。{/n}「クンラッドが他の候補者の死に対して罪を犯しているのなら、彼の刺客はまだどこかに潜んでいるはずです…待っているのです。あなたがローグトレーダーのマントをまとっているのなら、彼らがあなたを襲うほど無謀だとは思えません。ですが、皇帝に仕える普通の従僕の身分で船を降りるようなことがあれば…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラードの声がわずかに和らぐ。{/n}「選択の余地はありません、{name}様。あなたはローグトレーダーの後継者であり、運命は決まっているのです。それに…」{n}家令長は声を低くする。{/n}「クンラッドが他の候補者の死に対して罪を犯しているのなら、彼の刺客はまだどこかに潜んでいるはずです…待っているのです。あなたがローグトレーダーのマントをまとっているのなら、彼らがあなたを襲うほど無謀だとは思えません。ですが、皇帝に仕える普通の従僕の身分で船を降りるようなことがあれば…」

languages.text: {n}Abelards Stimme wird ein wenig sanfter.{/n} "Ihr habt keine Wahl, {name}. Ihr seid {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} der Freihändlerin, und Euer Schicksal ist vorbestimmt. Außerdem ..." {n}Der Truchsess spricht leiser.{/n} "Wenn Kunrad am Tod der anderen Kandidaten schuld ist, müssen seine Assassinen noch da sein ... und warten. Ich glaube nicht, dass sie einen Anschlag auf Euch wagen werden, wenn Ihr den Freihändlermantel tragt. Solltet Ihr das Schiff allerdings mit dem Status {mf|eines gewöhnlichen Dieners|einer gewöhnlichen Dienerin} des Imperators verlassen ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelards Stimme wird ein wenig sanfter.{/n} "Ihr habt keine Wahl, {name}. Ihr seid {mf|der Erbe|die Erbin} der Freihändlerin, und Euer Schicksal ist vorbestimmt. Außerdem ..." {n}Der Truchsess spricht leiser.{/n} "Wenn Kunrad am Tod der anderen Kandidaten schuld ist, müssen seine Assassinen noch da sein ... und warten. Ich glaube nicht, dass sie einen Anschlag auf Euch wagen werden, wenn Ihr den Freihändlermantel tragt. Solltet Ihr das Schiff allerdings mit dem Status {mf|eines gewöhnlichen Dieners|einer gewöhnlichen Dienerin} des Imperators verlassen ..."

languages.text: {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait plus douce.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas le choix, {name}. Vous êtes l'{mf|héritier désigné|héritière désignée} de la libre-marchande, et votre destin est déjà tracé. De plus... » {n}Le sénéchal poursuit à voix basse.{/n} « Si Kunrad est responsable de la mort des autres candidats, ses assassins sont probablement encore ici... à l'affût. Je doute qu'ils se montrent assez téméraires pour s'en prendre à vous une fois {mf|drapé|drapée} du manteau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Alors que si vous deviez débarquer du vaisseau avec un simple statut de {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Empereur... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix d'Abélard se fait plus douce.{/n} « Vous n'avez pas le choix, {name}. Vous êtes l'{mf|héritier désigné|héritière désignée} de la libre-marchande, et votre destin est déjà tracé. De plus... » {n}Le sénéchal poursuit à voix basse.{/n} « Si Kunrad est responsable de la mort des autres candidats, ses assassins sont probablement encore ici... à l'affût. Je doute qu'ils se montrent assez téméraires pour s'en prendre à vous une fois {mf|drapé|drapée} du manteau {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande}. Alors que si vous deviez débarquer du vaisseau avec un simple statut de {mf|serviteur|servante} de l'Empereur... »

languages.text: {n}La voz de Abelard se aligera levemente.{/n} «No tiene opción, {name}. Es {mf|el heredero|la heredera} legal de la Comerciante Independiente, por lo que su destino es inevitable. Además...». {n}El Senescal baja la voz.{/n} «Si Kunrad es culpable de la muerte de los demás candidatos, sus asesinos deben de seguir ahí fuera... a la espera. Dudo que sean tan osados como para atacar si acepta el cargo de Comerciante Independiente, pero si abandonara la nave como un{mf||a} mer{mf|o|a} súbdit{mf|o|a} del Emperador...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Abelard se aligera levemente.{/n} «No tiene opción, {name}. Es {mf|el heredero|la heredera} legal de la Comerciante Independiente, por lo que su destino es inevitable. Además...». {n}El Senescal baja la voz.{/n} «Si Kunrad es culpable de la muerte de los demás candidatos, sus asesinos deben de seguir ahí fuera... a la espera. Dudo que sean tan osados como para atacar si acepta el cargo de Comerciante Independiente, pero si abandonara la nave como un{mf||a} mer{mf|o|a} súbdit{mf|o|a} del Emperador...».

languages.text: {n}Abelard'ın sesi hafiften yumuşuyor.{/n} "Başka seçeneğiniz yok {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Hür Tacir, vârisi olarak sizi belirledi ve kaderiniz önceden tayin edildi. Ayrıca..." {n}Seneşal sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Diğer adayların ölümlerinden Kunrad sorumluysa suikastçıları hâlâ ortalıkta, pusuya yatmış olmalılar. Siz Hür Tacir kisvesi altındayken saldıracak kadar pervasız olacaklarını sanmıyorum. Lakin gemiden İmparator'un yalnızca sıradan bir hizmetkârı olarak ayrılırsanız..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard's voice softens slightly.{/n} "You do not have a choice, {name}. You are the named heir of the Rogue Trader, and your fate is predetermined. Besides..." {n}The Seneschal lowers his voice.{/n} "If Kunrad is guilty of the deaths of the other candidates, then his assassins must still be there... waiting. I doubt they are reckless enough to attack you if you are draped in the mantle of the Rogue Trader. But if you were to disembark the ship bearing only the status of an ordinary servant of the Emperor..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard'ın sesi hafiften yumuşuyor.{/n} "Başka seçeneğiniz yok {name} {mf|Bey|Hanım}. Hür Tacir, vârisi olarak sizi belirledi ve kaderiniz önceden tayin edildi. Ayrıca..." {n}Seneşal sesini alçaltıyor.{/n} "Diğer adayların ölümlerinden Kunrad sorumluysa suikastçıları hâlâ ortalıkta, pusuya yatmış olmalılar. Siz Hür Tacir kisvesi altındayken saldıracak kadar pervasız olacaklarını sanmıyorum. Lakin gemiden İmparator'un yalnızca sıradan bir hizmetkârı olarak ayrılırsanız..."
